name: Avoid The Ads
description:
The world is full of ads. They are everywhere. It never stops. You can't take it any more - you have to run! Make your way through the streets, dodging sneaker ads, movie trailers, election ads and beliebers as you go. Don't be taken in, don't touch the ads, and don't close your eyes!

Use your finger to steer your course, stay clear of all ads and collect ad blockers to shield yourself. You may try to escape, but you will find that you aren't safe anywhere, not even in the deepest desert.
